channel.title: Go Humble! RSS GAMES
channel.description: Awesome RSS Feeds about HumbleBundle games bundles!

item.title: 9 Circles of Bullet Hell: A Survivors Bundle
item.content:encoded: Let the bullets fly in our all-new 9 Circles of Bullet Hell Bundle. Play fan-favorite action-shooters and experience the thrill of intense, gun-based gameplay. Dive into Picayune Dreams, a roguelike blend of bullet horde survival and bullet hell chaos; Vampire Survivors, a retro-inspired shoot-’em-up with gothic horror elements; and Genome Guardian, a colorful asymmetrical shooter with psychedelic visuals. Discover fresh new games and help support Active Minds with your purchase!

item.title: Tycoon Titans Bundle
item.content:encoded: Crazy about resource management and sim-style games? Manage farms, amusement parks, and more in our all-new Tycoon Titans Bundle! Build and design your own game studio in Mad Games Tycoon 2, run your own coffee shop in Espresso Tycoon, and construct roller coasters, carnival rides, and more in RollerCoaster Tycoon 3: Complete Edition. Plus, get two coupons for newly launched games: 35% off of Frostpunk 2, as well as 10% off Farm Manager World when you purchase this bundle. Lose countless hours to your addicting digital businesses—and help support No Kid Hungry with your purchase!

item.title: XCOM Complete
item.content:encoded: Dive into the sci-fi world of XCOM with our comprehensive bundle of mainline games and DLCs. An all-out alien invasion has engulfed Earth, and it’s up to your elite team of planetary defenders to fight back and reclaim our homeland. Join the battle in iconic titles like XCOM: Chimera Squad, X-COM: Enforcer, XCOM 2: War of the Chosen, and more. Pay what you want for the ultimate XCOM experience, and help support the Michael J Fox Foundation with your purchase!

item.title: Play for Miracles with Twin Sails Interactive
item.description: Games ahoy from Twin Sails Interactive
item.content:encoded: Discover all the amazing titles of Twin Sails Interactive with the Play for Miracles Bundle! Dive into a curated collection of acclaimed indie gems survival adventures, deep strategy, board games, and more. From the deep strategic management of Terraforming Mars, to the gripping survival challenge of Survival: Fountain of Youth, this bundle showcases 12 standout titles and their DLC from our superb lineup. Support great games and a great cause—your purchase helps benefit Children's Miracle Network Hospitals!

item.title: Doom and Wolfenstein MAYhem
item.description: Bullets, blood, and fun—from id Software
item.content:encoded: Our latest bundle by id Software is an epic collection from iconic franchises with deep roots in the history of gaming—slay fascists in an alternate timeline in Wolfenstein and obliterate demons on Mars and in the DOOM series! Plus, get your shield ready with an exclusive coupon for the latest installment, DOOM: The Dark Ages, dropping in May. Play multiple installments from these mega franchises that range from old school to modern, like DOOM (1993) and DOOM Eternal.
